ShowTimePlayed.description: /played displays how long you have played this character for

ShowCharacterAge.description: /age displays how long ago you created this character

ShowMonstersRemaining.description: /remaining displays the number of monsters remaining in the area

ShowDeaths.description: /deaths displays how many deaths you have incurred

ShowLadder.description: /ladder shows the top ten characters on the current ladder

DestroyCursorItem.description: /destroy destroys the item on your cursor (be careful!)

Whois.description: /whois displays some information about a character by name

ShowCursorItemLevel.description: /itemlevel displays the level of an item on your cursor

ReportBug.description: /bug reports a bug and gives you the report reference number

Ignore1.description: /ignore ignores an account by character name

Unignore1.description: /unignore stops ignoring an account by character name

ClearIgnoreList.description: /clear_ignore_list removes all accounts from your ignore list

ShowPassives.description: /passives displays a breakdown of your passive skill points

InviteToParty.description: /invite invites someone to your party by name

AddFriend.description: /friend adds a friend to your list by name

AutoReply.description: /autoreply [message] Autoreply to whispers with a custom message.

SetAFK.description: /afk [message] Autoreply to whispers that you are AFK. Performing any action, including chatting, will cancel AFK mode.

DoNotDisturb1.description: /dnd [message] Autoreply to whispers that you are DND and ignore all incoming messages.

SetGlobalChatChannel.description: /global X changes to global chat channel X.

SetTradeChatChannel.description: /trade X changes to trade chat channel X.

RecheckAchievements.description: /recheck_achievements Forces a recheck of certain achievements

ResetExperiencePerHour.description: /reset_xp Resets your experience per hour calculation.

SaveHideout.description: /save_hideout Saves the current Hideout layout to a file that can be later loaded or shared.
